version_description:
• Support voice control
• Improved some details

• Support voice control
• Improved some details

- Optimize the timer
- Optimize the settings of scene
- Stability optimization

- Optimize the timer
- Optimize the settings of scene
- Stability optimization

- Optimize the timer
- Optimize the settings of scene
- Stability optimization

Update log
1. Optimize the timing function experience
2. Optimizing multilingual adaptation
3. Basic performance optimization and stability improvemen

Update log
Optimize the "Forget Pattern" page
Support IFTTT
Scene support multi-language
Optimize the Widget
Increase the effcincy of transmitting data
The default name of the devices becomes more humanized

Upadate Log
1. support Russian
2. update the status of Bluetooth device more promptly
3. shared devices can also receive push
4. select the city more convenient when adding scene

Optimize the user feedback experience, enriched the function of the push message

Detailed update:
* When the application is opened, the received push will be opened from the top
* The push of the alarm class can continue to ring
* User feedback can add contact information, So as to facilitate the staff to carry out the service
* Intelligent scene to support Fahrenheit, Celsius two units to improve the stability of equipment connections, reduce the rate of offline
* Other stability to enhance

The network detection function is increased, and the multi language support is optimized.

Complete more updates log:
1. optimize the display of third party control
2. provide equipment network status detection function
3. Optimizing Multi Language Support
4., optimize the national choice function
5. other stability enhancement

The network detection function is increased, and the multi language support is optimized.

Complete more updates log:
1. optimize the display of third party control
2. provide equipment network status detection function
3. Optimizing Multi Language Support
4., optimize the national choice function
5. other stability enhancement
bug fixed
bugs fixed
Optimize the Multilingual translation
bugs fixed
Optimize the Multilingual translation

1. Brand new UI;
2. Newly added Home function: supporting management of family members' authorities;
3. Room management: making your house management more convenient;
4. Optimized scenes

1. Local scenes and local control functions of ZigBee devices are newly launched
2. Camera configuration mode , OTA upgrade optimization
3. Experience optimization and defect repair
bug fixed
Bug Fixed

1. Optimized log-in and registration functions, improved interfaces such as UI, and smoother user experience.
2. Optimized group control function, to group different smart hardwares of the same category.
3. Added push function to give automatic tips on the operations being excuted under automatic scenes.

1. Language version optimization, adding more localized language translation.
2. Optimize the Zigbee scene linkage response, improve the success rate and stability rate
3. Newly added equipment control for sweeping robot products.
1. Fix bugs related to infrared device usage.

1. Optimized the registration process and updated the operation experience.
2. The interface of voice input on the home page of the App has been optimized.

1. Optimized the registration process and updated the operation experience.
2. The interface of voice input on the home page of the App has been optimized.

1. App home page design style optimization, new weather and other environmental conditions.
2. The IOS side supports the system widget function, and the user can directly control the device without opening the APP.
3. Universal remote control function optimization, App supports remote control sub-function display control on the home page.

1. Optimized notification of disconnected devices
2. Added Message Notification to Automation and More Services
3. Optimized authorization process of Google Assistant
4. Supported ipc to monitor multi-channel to control Pan Tilt Zoom
5. Supported to use verification code to bind voice skill

1. Improved device paring and enabled feedback for failed device pairing.
2. Supported robot vacuum with IP camera, etc.

1.Device list improved for display visual and controlling easily
2.Device list sequenced
3.Optimize on IPC, Robot cleaner, IR controller and etc

1.The new function of "Multi-Control Association". Controlling the same device by one or more switches
2.The optimization of the video and image display in Message Center Segment
3.The improvement of Smart Scene user experience
4.The other bugs fixed

1.ZigBee device supports creating groups
2.Scene control supports siri shortcut
3.Smart scene execution action supports group management
4.The optimization of family member management

1、自动化可以设置生效时间段，在生效时间段内的自动化才会被触发。
2、场景、自动化增加延时动作。
3、多控类开关产品支持关联配置。
4、首页的气象面板支持单位切换。
5、配网流程优化：若家中已有支持最新固件的产品，后续设备配网可省去输入Wi-Fi密码步骤。
Fix a problem with some types of device failing to match the network.

1.Brand new version of Message Center, which consists of multi-functions such as interactive visual optimization, notificatioon classification and non-disturbance.
2.Adding "Help Center" menu, which improves user feedback procedure including malfunction submission, product advice, FAQ and so on.

1. Optimize the purchase experience of Video Cloud Storage, you can purchase of this service in Personal center, More services.
2. Optimize the user experience of IPC alarm message viewing, alarm sound and operations.
3. Upgrade the album function , support photo and video Viewing and Editing.
4. Voice Input Interactive Experience Enhancement
5. Bug fix.

1.Support to use Apple watch to control your devices and operate scenes.
2.Automation adds a "leave or arrive" condition that triggers a smart device or scene based on your location.
3.Sharing your family to others requires a second confirmation to better protect your privacy.
4.Add a new distribution method so that discover new devices actively and increase device classification function for finding devices more conveniently.
5.Support for Russian, Dutch, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Slovak, Ukrainian and Korean.
Bug Fixed

1. To optimize the user experience of sweeper products.
2. The sweeper adds map filling points and map edge tracing functions.
3. Bug fix.

1. The APP supports switching areas, enjoy it anywhere.
2. Optimize Siri voice control function. Voice control device is more simple.
3. Support 3D Touch function, shortcut operation is more convenient.
4. Improved user experience for voice control, so simple to use voice control the device.
5. Added scene widget function, scene control does not need to enter the APP again.
6. Improve the interactive experience of the interface.

1.The new function of "Multi-Control Association". Controlling the same device by one or more switches
2.The optimization of the video and image display in Message Center Segment
3.The improvement of Smart Scene user experience
4.The other bugs fixed

1.Device list improved for display visual and controlling easily
2.Device list sequenced
3.Optimize on IPC, Robot cleaner, IR controller and etc
Bug Fixed

1.Upgrading the settings of the Message Center, that is, notifications, device alarm messages and family messages can be received separately.
2.Optimizing interaction of Do-Not-Disturb Schedule.
3.Supporting for searching and adding Wi-Fi networking devices.
4.Local scene of the gateway in "Smart-Scene"can be executed with one click, inneed the Internet.
5.Device list in Home can be switched between List view and Grid view.
6.Increasing device status duration in condition type of "Smart-Automation”.（depending on the device）.

1.Enhance security mechanism for the account. The user will receive a notification when a new device accesses the account.
2.Improve user experience in setting up scenario automation.
3.Optimize the interface of "Feedback - Help Center".

1. Improved device paring and enabled feedback for failed device pairing.
2. Supported robot vacuum with IP camera, etc.

1. Home role increasd "home owner" to optimize Home permission settings
2. Added support for user-defined device images
3. Added device offline reminder (need to be turned on)
4. Optimized OTA upgrade experience
5. Added recommendations for Smart scene and Automation
Bug Fixed

1.Optimized OTA experience for Bluetooth and Wi-Fi devices
2.Supported Amazon Alexa's App-to-App Account Linking, one-click to link with the Skill
3.Supported to add child devices by “Auto Find” in Zigbee Gateway's app panel
Bug Fixed

1. Add Smart Scene recommendations
2. Optimize user interface for Smart Scenes
3. Optimize user interface for Lighting Group Device
4. The Smart Camera supported multi-channel preview on same screen

1. Optimized notification of disconnected devices
2. Added Message Notification to Automation and More Services
3. Optimized authorization process of Google Assistant
4. Supported ipc to monitor multi-channel to control Pan Tilt Zoom
5. Supported to use verification code to bind voice skill

1. Optimized notification of disconnected devices
2. Added Message Notification to Automation and More Services
3. Optimized authorization process of Google Assistant
4. Supported ipc to monitor multi-channel to control Pan Tilt Zoom
5. Supported to use verification code to bind voice skill
Bug Fixed

1. New configuration for Bluetooth devices
2. Enabled login with Apple ID
3. Optimized page interactions for Smart Scenarios
4. Resolved some known issues

2. Enabled login with Apple ID

[Devices Management]
-Enable to view multiple camera recordings in the same screen via Home page.
-Customize logo of group devices
[Message Center]
-Mark multiple messages as read at the same time
-Play videos and audios recorded by cameras
[Network Pairing Management]
-Add videos explaning how to pair network for some Wi-Fi devices
[Repair and Optimization]
-Resolve known issues

[Devices Management]
-Enable to view multiple camera recordings in the same screen via Home page.
-Customize logo of group devices
[Message Center]
-Mark multiple messages as read at the same time
[Network Pairing Management]
-Add videos explaning how to pair network for some Wi-Fi devices
[Repair and Optimization]
-Resolve known issues

[Devices Management]
- Add icon of whether Bluetooth devices are available
[Smart Scene]
- Add scene logs
[Repair and Optimization]
- Optimize map component of Robot Vacuum Cleaner
- Optimize the process of removing a device
- Optimize warning notification
- Resolve known issues

[Voice Features]
-Support viewing third-party voice assistants in Device Details of Electrician and Lighting
[Device Management]
-Support adding devices to HomeKit with further control
-Support deleting multiple devices at once in Device Management
[Repair and Optimization]
-Optimize the Firmware Update process to prevent from battery damage when the device power gets low
-Resolve known issues

[Home Management]
-Invite new users to register and join your home via third party App by sharing an invitation code
[Smart Scenes]
-Preset sunset/sunrise time as the execution condition for smart scenes
-Add the beginner's guide of creating a smart scene
[Voice Features]
-Go directly to Google Home via App link in Third-party Access to authorize voice skills
[Repair and Optimization]
-Resolve known issues

-Invite new users to register and join your home via third party App by sharing an invitation code

-Preset sunset/sunrise time as the execution condition for smart scenes
-Add the beginner's guide of creating a smart scene
[Voice Features]
-Go directly to Google Home via App link in Third-party Access to authorize voice skills

-Resolve known issues

- Add "Experience mode" so that users can experience App without registering

- Optimize process of scanning QR code to pair

- Optimize device icon edit
